title: 481 - How We Talk About Suicide Matters: A Free Course for Journalists
itunes:title: 481 - How We Talk About Suicide Matters: A Free Course for Journalists
description: Suicide is a significant public health problem. News coverage, and how we talk about it with each other, can actually help prevent suicide and connect those who are vulnerable with lifesaving resources. Journalist and MPH suicide expert Aneri Pattani talks with Stephanie Desmon about a free Coursera course she helped develop, Responsible Reporting on Suicide for Journalists, and what we can all learn to help reframe the conversation around hope and resilience. Learn more about the course here.
